messages.message: Great news! I’ll start testing this with customers today.

One or two early pieces of feedback:
• Moving projects under the 3 dot menu takes ages and I assumed that it had crashed, can we warn people about this, or provide a more informative loading bar or something to communicate progress?
• It’d be great to be able to move a project from within the project, rather than just from the My Hub screen, could we add the option on the settings page within the project somewhere?
Thanks for the feedback! We'll record this. The reason why project moving takes a long time is because we're actually moving the project files it self to the new drive location
Yep I thought thats why it took the time. It did take longer than I expected for a single document, but did succeeed. If there was a loading bar with steps to show progress it’d be fine.
sounds good, we can definitely improve that
